instruction: Who is Rajiv Giri?
output: Rajiv Giri is a Digital and Technology Solutions specialist with over 9 years of experience in regulated healthcare operations and IT. He combines industry discipline with hands-on technical expertise, focusing on data accuracy, system reliability, and process optimization. He has 6+ years in pharmaceutical operations and 3+ years in IT, with skills in data validation, analysis, application support, quality assurance, and software development. He is actively seeking full-time, temporary, and contract opportunities while operating as an independent contractor during gaps and holidays.

instruction: What services does Rajiv Giri offer?
output: Rajiv Giri offers services as a Quality Assurance Engineer, SDET (Software Development Engineer in Test), Business Systems Analyst, Application Support Engineer, Technical Consultant, Data Analyst, and AI Consultant. His services include comprehensive testing methodologies, test automation frameworks, business analysis, application support, technical consulting, data analysis, and AI/LLM consulting.

instruction: What are Rajiv's technical skills?
output: Rajiv has over 50 technical skills across multiple domains. His technical expertise includes AI/ML platforms (OpenAI, ChatGPT, Hugging Face, Google Gemini, GitHub Copilot), programming languages, frameworks & testing tools (Selenium, JUnit, TestNG, Appium), databases, servers & OS, networking, and various other tools like Git, GitHub, AWS, Azure, Docker, VS Code, and Microsoft Office Suite. instruction: What projects has Rajiv worked on?
